Keywords: Cosmic , Deity , Ruler , Warrior
Real Name: Sequoia
Special Powers
THE DEATH BLOSSOM SPROUTS: At the beginning of your turn, generate a Cotati Plant hindering terrain marker within 6 squares. Then, count the number of Cotati Plant markers and perform the listed effect(s): *2+: Generate a Cotati Warrior bystander [MAX: 4]. *4+: Until your next turn, Quoi and Cotati Warrior bystanders occupying or adjacent to one or more Cotati Plant markers modify attack and defense +1. *6+: Quoi can use Regeneration this turn, but only if he occupies a Cotati Plant marker. *8+: Deal 1 unavoidable damage to all opposing characters occupying or adjacent to one or more Cotati Plant markers.
SWORDSMAN'S LESSONS: Charge, Flurry, Stealth.

His name is short for Sequoia. I'd imagine you'd pronounce it like the tree. Just take the middle part and match pronunciation, if that makes sense.
July 24, 2022
C-Dog
How exactly does someone pronounce this guy's name? I feel bad for not knowing. It's like that kid that transfers into your 2nd grade class. Is his name Steve or Frank? They told us but I was playing Oregon Trail on that sweet Apple 2e. I don't want to guess and then get it wrong and then he starts crying and then next thing I know my dad is coming in to pick me up and he had already been "working" on that Jim Beam bottle for a few hours and gets in a fist fight with Frank-Steve's dad in the parking lot and I have to transfer schools. Again. And then my next school has a Quoi in it and I'm totally screwed.

Coyote's Own
Since they should. 7 tokens are more than 2 tokens and more than 4 toke in addition to being more than 6 tokens. The text also used "effect(s)" means you should be able to activate multiple if you fulfill the requirements.

Goop
I guess it depends on how big of a game your are playing but its pretty rare you see much beyond 8 turns in most games. You really need to have a big LONG game going for her to see any value. Otherwise she's probably best played on her lower line to generate a bunch of empower pogs. Thats about it.
